line_1: Say, hast thou, with fond affection,

line_2: Say, hast thou, with fond affection,

line_1: To these, thy nightly offerings of affection,
line_2: Drawn from thy ready talent for selection;

line_1: The fixed and yearning looks of strong affection;
line_2: Remorseful musings, sunk to deep dejection,

line_1: Midst the joys of the heart sits one tender affection
line_2: And, when feeling sinks down into silent dejection,
And bring the rest into subjection.
